name: Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Refillable Retinol Alternative Serum
about: What it is: A serum that visibly lifts, firms, and smooths wrinkles with Caudalie’s patented alternative to retinol...Skin Type: Normal and Dry..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:- Resveratrol: A powerful vine antioxidant that visibly firms and reduces the look of wrinkles..- Hyaluronic Acid: Two molecular sizes of hyaluronic acid hydrate and leave skin feeling soft..- Vegan Collagen 1: Visibly firms and smooths facial contours...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with Caudalie’s exclusive, patented blend of Resveratrol, hyaluronic acid, and vegan collagen, this serum is three-times more effective than retinol to firm and lift the appearance of the skin. This potent, yet gentle formula leaves skin looking more youthful without irritation and is suitable for all skin types...Clinical Results:.Action on skin appearance. In vitro test on ingredients association:.3X more effective than retinol to visibly firm and lift skin..In a clinical study of 42 subjects, after 2 months:.98% saw firmer, more lifted skin..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Hexyldecanol, Hexyldecyl Laurate, Squalane, Tocopheryl Acetate, C20-22 Alkyl Phosphate, Palmitoyl Grapevine Shoot Extract, C20-22 Alcohols, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hyaluronic Acid, Adenosine, Sodium Hydroxide, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Phytate, Khaya Senegalensis Bark Extract, Maltodextrin, Linalool, Limonene, Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Coumarin, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 Sh-Polypeptide-47. (251/036)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply morning and evening to face and neck. .-Follow with Caudalie’s Resveratrol Lift Firming Cashmere Cream (sold separately) for better results....Recycling Instructions:..-Glass bottle and refill packaging are recyclable..-Pump is recyclable through Terracycle. ...Refill Product Instructions:.-When the serum runs out, break off the tip of the aluminum tube and squeeze into empty bottle..-The aluminum refill packaging is fully recyclable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Caudalie and was excited to try this product on my 40ish skin. The serum contains an alternative to retinol, as I am too sensitive to retinol products. It contains resveratrol, a powerful antioxidant, vegan collagen, and hyaluronic acid. Product went on smooth and worked great under makeup or at night under moisturizer. There was a light fresh scent.  I did not find the scent to be overpowering. I really loved this serum, however after using it daily my skin became tight and I determined the product was too strong for my skin to use on a daily basis. Every other day or a couple of times of week is what my skin can handle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is potentially my newest obsession. I've only had the product for roughly a week.  I am 40. My skin is dry to combination and in overall decent shape. I've tried similar retinoid based products but they typically leave my skin dry and requiring extra moisturizer. This not only softens, it makes my skin glow and look so fresh. And the smell is so refreshing. Worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, dull skin and I struggle with redness and texture. In my 30s, I'm now dealing with acne on occasion as well, and with little closed comedones underneath the surface of my skin. I've gone through 3 bottles of this serum. It's not irritating on my very sensitive skin, a little bit goes a long way and it smells lovely (the fragrance is not overpowering or irritating). When applying this, my skin instantly feels plumped and hydrated. The next morning my skin feels soft and my redness is definitely reduced. Over time, I have noticed an improvement in the overall brightness of my skin as well, since I struggle with dullness and texture. I love this stuff. For me, it's totally worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

The formula is lightweight gel and soaks into your skin really well. I used it but didn't see a ton of results, though my skin felt soft and bouncy afterward

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who takes pride in my skincare routine, I'm always on the lookout for products that can give my skin the extra boost it needs. Excited by the claims of the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum, I decided to give it a try. However, I must say that I was left a bit disappointed with the results on my skin.  Firstly, I appreciate the brand's commitment to using natural and sustainable ingredients. Caudalie's focus on utilizing resveratrol and hyaluronic acid as an alternative to retinol is definitely noteworthy. It's always reassuring to know that the products I'm using are carefully formulated with my skin's health in mind.  That being said, I didn't see any significant improvement in my skin after using this serum. Despite diligently incorporating it into my skincare routine, I didn't notice any visible firming or lifting effects. I was hoping for more noticeable results in terms of minimizing fine lines and improving overall skin texture. While the texture of the serum itself is lightweight and quickly absorbs into the skin, I personally felt that it left my skin feeling slightly dry after application. I would recommend ensuring that proper hydration is maintained before and after using this product to prevent any potential dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #freeproduct   I'm just at the age where I'm beginning to become concerned about skin aging. However, I also have sensitive skin, and my brief test of a retinol product left my skin feeling dry and itchy, so I did not continue with it.  This product seems to be a great alternative. I can't yet vouch for it longer term, but it my several weeks of use, my skin hasn't been irritated or dry. Quite the opposite, it fact. Even without a moisturizer, my skin felt soft and smooth, probably a benefit of the hyaluronic acid. I do notice some improvement in firmness, as well.  My one semi-complaint is the fragrance, which is pleasant but quite noticeable. I sometimes worry about fragrance, especially on the face. This did not seem to cause any reaction so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I was given a complimentary sample of this product from @Topbox Marketing for testing purposes, all opinions and words are mine. I've tried several similar products and wasn't impressed so I was extremely skeptical about trying this one. When I started using it I applied it to my face and neck in the morning before my makeup and in the evening before my moisturizer. It took a few weeks before I noticed any difference and with continued use my skin has never looked or felt better. My skin is so soft and it looks a lot more firm too. The fine lines, crow's feet and the bags under my eyes are not as prominent and my skin looks healthier. The serum glide's on without any greasy oily feeling, it smells sweet & refreshing and doesn't clash with the fragrance of my moisturizer. It is pretty expensive for such a small bottle that you can empty real quick by using it everyday but with these results it's definitely worth it. #freeproduct #Caudalie

I was nervous to use it in the day because it said it is a retinol alternative, but the directions said to use it in the day. So I used it for both.  It hydrates my face and makes is smooth. It has no oil so you will need a moisturizer for this. But you can keep it on your skin for quite a bit of time after using it with no moisturizer. It will seal the moisture into the skins so it doesn't dry further. I have been using it for about a month. I haven't noticed any anti ageing results but I have a youthful face. I do think it helps keeps the skin from being dry and brightens the skin.

This serum is very lightweight and absorbs quickly into my skin perfect for combination skin like mine!

This Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum is heading in the right direction and I like it, but it could still be better and has room for improvement. I love that it is free of and does not have parabens, PEG, phthalates, or silicones in it and it is suitable for all skin types! The Collagen 1 in it is vegan, comes from a plant and is GMO-free too! It's also great that the glass bottle and pump are recycled! Unfortunately though it still is made with and has some toxic ingredients plus fragrance in it. If it was made with only 100% natural, non-toxic ingredients and was fragrance free, then it would be perfect, completely healthy and safe to use! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #freeproduct

reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to try Caudalie and since I'm breastfeeding still, I'm not using retinoids in my skincare routine so I was excited for both these reasons to try this serum. For a clean product, it does have what I'd consider to be a little fragrant but it didn't affect my slighty sensitive skin. The scent is nice but can be a little overwhelming. The texture and formula felt smooth and silky. it sunk right into my skin with no problems of pilling or tackiness. I appreciate the pump top instead of a dropper but it seems weird there is no cap. I'm still not sure how to feel about that. I haven't noticed much of a difference but it's only been a few weeks and I don't have heavy wrinkles for it to be THAT noticeable, however, I am 27 and have started the anti-aging journey already. The color is cute as well as the glass packaging and overall, I'd recommend to try it if you have any of the concerns mentioned. reviews.review_title: No meaningful impact; too watery and fragrant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.  I won’t be paying retail to keep using it.  Overall, I had no negative reactions to the product, but I didn’t notice a meaningful improvement in the appearance of fine lines or firmness to justify the high price point.  The serum has a very watery consistency which I didn’t like, and it has a strong floral fragrance.  The scent doesn’t linger, but it’s so strong initially that it makes me nervous about what I’m putting on my skin.  That said, it doesn’t make my skin look shiny/oily, or create a greasy feel (a common problem I run into with serums), but I definitely have to add an additional moisturizer to actually make my skin feel hydrated—this serum doesn’t do that on its own despite its hyaluronic acid.  This isn’t a bad product, but I didn’t see enough of a positive impact to make the cost worthwhile.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.  As with any new product, remember to start slow and then increase the number of times you use it if your skin seems happy with it. Always remember to patch test first for at least 48 hours before you put it all over your face.   To start off, I used this in the AM, once a week. I loved how hydrating it is! Resveratrol as an ingredient also supports ingredients like peptides and Vitamin-C and makes them work better.   I definitely see a difference on the days I use it v/s the days I don't use it. I definitely feel some firmness and lift when I use it.   Remember to use a small amount. After applying it, I wait a bit to apply my moisturizer. Always remember to use sunscreen during the day!   I'm loving this product so far! It makes everything smooth, hydrated, lifted, and supple!

It does have a sort of lavender like fragrance, so I would suggest avoiding if you are sensitive for fragrance. Overall I really enjoyed it though. reviews.review_text: I wish I had more time form my opinion on the effectiveness of this product however I can share my thoughts on it overall. First and foremost, this is definitely scented so if you’re sensitive to scents, I’m not sure if this is a good choice for you. It’s not overpowering and doesn’t linger the entire time. I’d say it’s probably 5-6/10 in terms of how strong the scent is. It’s very herbal. Almost floral. As far as its consistency, it’s very fluid and lightweight. It sinks into the skin rather quickly and I’d say loses it’s outer feeling on the skin completely after about 15 minutes. But it soaks into the skin beautifully and feels quite nourishing. I have dry skin so for me this definitely felt a little plumping and soothing. Packaging is really nice. The frosted glass component feels very luxurious as does the locking pump. I love that detail. I look forward to continuing usage of this product. I like it so far(: #freeproduct I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm fairly new to the Caudalie brand and to Vegan/clean beauty in general. This is a milky serum that gives your skin a lovely drink of hydration, plumping, and lifting! I have dry, mature skin and tend to prefer oil based serums but I kept an open mind. I don't expect miracles. This serum did have a tightening effect when used consistently, which made me happy! I used it mornings and evenings. It has a very slight scent that is pleasant and fades away almost immediately. As an alternative to chemical ingredients I found it to be just as effective, with the exception of not quite moisturizing enough for my skin and I would layer it with an additional serum. Would I recommend it? Yes. Would I buy it? Maybe.  *I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

With this product truly a little bit does go a long way because it's not super thick and it is very light and thin a little bit can get pretty much your entire face and your neck so the product should last you a good amount of time. And I did see visible results with using this product. I will continue using this product.

As a hydrating serum it is really good, it absorbs immediately into my skin, softening and filling the skin with a delightful glow, I feel my skin become plumper and radiant.  I enjoy using this #freeproduct antioxidant instant firming retinol alternative serum, the quality is great compared to other serums in the market. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift from TopBox #freeproduct in exchange for my review.  I have been using this serum for the last two weeks and it works just as well as my Retinol products on my dark spots and fine lines.  Since this is a vegan retinol alternative, it is good for all skin types and can be used in both the morning and evening since there is no issue with sun sensitivity. Overall, this product is effective on my aging skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had great experiences with the Caudalie brand. Several of their products are my favorite go-to in their category. The Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum is one of those products. The serum is very lightweight, liquidy, smooth and creamy. It spreads easily, covers well, and absorbs quickly. I only need one pump of the serum to cover my whole face. I have also been using the serum on my neck and it's looking great. With daily use I have found that my skin feels a bit firmer and it is much softer and smoother. It has really helped my dry facial skin to become normalized. I no longer have a tight, dry feeling to my skin and it looks healthier. My fine lines are also minimized. I look forward to further improvements as I continue to use this serum. I have used retinol products before and had some problems with them being drying to my skin. The Caudalie Retinal Alternative Serum does not dry out my skin, but provides significant moisturization and improvement. The product itself is for all skin types, it contains vegan collagen, 98% of the ingredients are from natural origins and it is not tested on animals, which is important to me. It does not contain any parabens, thalates, silicones, PEG or animal products. The only negative that I have found is that the scent is not what I am used to and I do not really like this scent. It does not linger after drying, which is good. I definitely recommend the high quality products from Caudalie, and especially this Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum. While I did receive this product in exchange for use and a review, I am a dedicated Caudalie customer. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Retinol can be somewhat harsh on the skin, especially in the winter (for me anyhow). I've been using this Claudalie Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum for about a month now (am and pm) and I like it quite a bit. The light, yet creamy consistency easily absorbs into the skin completely in two minutes or less.   I have not experienced any tackiness to my skin, or any issues of any kind. It does not clog the pores and plays nicely with my other products. My skin has been looking pretty great actually. There is a faint scent, which reminds me somewhat of my mom's gum of choice when I was young, Big Red. Although very faint, the scent makes me happy. Lastly, this frosted glass beauty has a locking pump which makes it perfect for travel.

reviews.review_title: My Skin Is Glowing and Looks Much Healthier
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight this serum is. It comes in a beautiful glass bottle with a pump dispenser. Which really gives me the right amount of product to use. You don't need much, a little goes a long ways. This serum has a silky, creamy texture that absorbs immediately into my skin. This product makes my skin feel so hydrated. Which makes my skin look plump. I've been using this in the morning and evening right after I cleanse and applied my toner. I like to layer my serum, so this watery serum is great to start out with. Then, I apply a thicker serum. When it comes to layering serums, keep in mind the thin-to-thick rule. My skin looks so much healthier, and it feels so soft and smooth. I haven't noticed a difference in my wrinkles, but I will continue to use this, hoping to see improvement in those ugly lines. This serum has a sweet scent that's really light. It dissipates quickly and I don't notice it anymore. My skin has a healthy collagen glow, and I've received several compliments on how great my skin looks. My friends asked me what new skincare product I was using to improve my skin. I definitely recommend this for hydrating and making your skin look healthier. #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: Very effective serum, I am highly impressed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a #freeproduct in exchange for my honest opinion.  During the winter time my skin can become too dry and not always tolerate retinol, particularly with prolonged use, so I was really excited to try some alternative. It was the first time I used resveratrol, this unique ingredient works like a powerful antioxidant and helps to reduce the look of wrinkles, to lift and firm the skin. Another important ingredients are vegan collagen and two molecular sizes of hyaluronic acid. I am glad 98% ingredients are natural and this is a vegan product, it has no parabens, phenoxyethanol, phtalates, huiles minerals, PEG and silicones. The packaging is very good quality matte glass bottle and the pump convenient to use, it is easy to get the exact amount of product needed. I also enjoyed the box with the picture of the french vineyards inside, the reference to the main ingredient.  I used the serum twice per day as part of my morning and night skincare routine during 3 weeks on my face and the area around my eyes right after cleansing and toning. I really liked the consistency of the serum, it is milky and creamy, very lightweight and easy to apply. Feels like a luxury high end product, it absorbs fast and leaves skin soft, smooth, hydrated and nourished. The formula is very gentle and never irritated my sensitive skin. It doesn’t peel under the makeup and helps to prevent the dryness during the day. I noticed it smoothed wrinkles, especially around eyes area, the serum also leaves a healthy radiant glow, firms and lifts face and neck. I also enjoyed the herbal scent, which helps me to relax, especially before the nighttime.   I am highly impressed with the results, the serum does exactly what it claims to do and I would definitely recommend it.  #freeproduct

I like this Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum.  I have been using it a while and it seems to be erasing those little lines on my face.  I wish that it had a more pleasant scent but it melts into the skin pretty quick and then the smell goes away.  It is worth trying out.  #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: Good serum and helps to smoothen the face
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Serum as a #freeproduct in exchange for my honest opinion. I used the serum twice daily, morning and night after cleansing my face. Then apply my usual facial moisturizer. I have sensitive skin and did not have any reaction to the serum.  The serum is very light and spreads easily and absorbs quickly. reviews.review_text: Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum has a soft, delicate fragrance. It's thin in texture and easily absorbed into my skin. It leaves my skin soft, hydrated, and boosts radiance. It cooperates well with my other skincare products and cosmetics. I've had no negative interaction nor pilling. What I love about this product is that although I didn't notice much of a difference in lift, other people did and mentioned it. Common questions were if I'd lost weight. I  haven't. Others see my face and neck shape as more slender. Personally, I noticed the smile lines around my eyes and mouth as well as the horizontal lines on my neck are no longer visible after use. I don't know if it's a permanent solution or as a result of adding Caudalie to my regular skincare routine. The compliments regarding my face and neck being more slender are a welcome surprise to me that I hope to observe myself with extended use. To date, my favorite compliment came from a gentleman who saw me with nothing except skincare and questioned my age. I plan on continuing the use of this product to observe if I experience further benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i received this product from Caudalie and Topbox for my honest review. I have sensitive, allergy prone skin. After day two, I got a rash on my temple. The next two days, I had more breakouts and had to stop using it. I do not know which ingredient(s) I reacted to. The serum was pleasantly light scented, so it didn't last. It's a thin creamy white serum that you can use on face, neck and decollatage. I feel I did not use it long enough to tell any positive skin change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Caudalie's Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Serum is a product designed to provide firming effects for the skin. It contains a blend of ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, vine resveratrol, and a peptide complex. This serum aims to target wrinkles and fine lines while helping to improve skin firmness and elasticity. Notably, the Retinol Alternative aspect suggests that it aims to provide similar benefits to retinol (a derivative of vitamin A known for its skin-renewing properties) without the potential sensitivity or irritation that some people experience with retinol-based products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mail call ... Caudalie  Reservatrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum.  I received it as a #freeproduct from Caudalie  and Topbox  as my new mission. This serum is #vegan and has a pleasant light scent. It is creamy and milky, and very liquid. Upon me applying it on my face and neck, my dry skin instantly drank this luxurious product in. I was able to apply it easily   on my freshly cleaned face. The serum is hydrating,  yet not sticky or goopy at all. It absorbed in well and gave me a healthy , lifting glow. Highly recommend it! As a note, the Firming serum has plenty of fantastic ingredients,  like #Hyaluronicacid , #vegancollagen and #resveratrol1000. It's intended for #allskintypes and #wrinkles.

reviews.review_text: I’m currently pregnant and was looking for a retinol alternative. When I heard about this one, I was super excited and willing to pay the price tag for it. However, I can’t stand the smell. It’s incredibly perfumed to cover up the fermented smell - but it fails to do so. A few seconds after applying, the fermented smell comes through anyway along with the perfume. I know part of it could be that my nose is extra sensitive right now, but it’s terrible. I tried to stick it out for a few weeks but I couldn’t handle it. I also didn’t notice any difference in my skin over the weeks I used it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. And I am absolutely loving it! I e never been a huge fan of retinols - they are rough on my skin and cause a lot of extra redness for me. But I do love the smoothing effect that they have. So I was really excited to try an alternative and boy did Caudalie’s Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum deliver! I noticed an immediate difference in my skin after my first use. It was so smooth - all of the tiny rough texture you sometimes get after using a new product was completely gone. And now that I’ve used it for close to a month I like it even more.  It’s not harsh on my skin, it’s actually cool and quite soothing. And it’s a great watery texture, so no slime from too many products or pilling makeup. I’m honestly really loving it! If you’re in the market for a retinol alternative (or even a retinol) this is definitely a great choice! #freeproduct

I used Caudalíe Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum every morning and night. My skin feels hydrated and silky.I received this #freeproduct in exchange for my honest review. reviews.review_text: I received Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum, complimentary, via Topbox Circle for reviewing purposes. Caudalie can be hit or miss for me. This one's a hit. It does have a very strong scent which is pretty to me, but mature. I have very dry skin and this hydrates my skin well with no greasiness. My skin looks more radiant and it seems to help with fine lines. It's a high price point and you can find comparable products for less money. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely thrilled with the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum! This serum has been a game-changer for my skincare routine. It's lightweight, yet incredibly effective in reducing fine lines and giving my skin a firmer, more youthful appearance. Plus, it doesn't irritate my skin like traditional retinol products. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative serum in exchange for review from Topbox Circle. It took me about 4 months to use up the bottle after slowly introducing into my routine first at night, then during the day as well over the course of a couple of weeks. This serum is a milky liquid that absorbs fairly quickly. It has a moderate herbal-earthy smell that seems similar to other Caudalie products I've tried. I like that you can adjust the amount of product delivered from the pump by twisting the nozzle. I used about one and a half pumps to cover my face, neck, & decolletage. My main gripe about the product overall is the pump opening. Product can gunk up and form a goopy booger in the opening, which either clogs the nozzle or gets dispensed with the next usage. Upon receiving this product, I hoped to target the areas where I am beginning to see the most wrinkles in my skin: horizontal lines across my forehead, Venus rings around my neck, and vertical wrinkles from my neck toward my decolletage. I definitely don't think this affected the wrinkles in my forehead, and I'm not sure about my Venus rings, but, anecdotally, I feel like I see slightly less pronounced wrinkles in my decolletage area. I think this serum might best be used to mitigate damage before it occurs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct I recently had the pleasure of using the Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum, and I must say, it has left a lasting impression. I incorporated this serum into my nighttime skincare routine, applying it just before bedtime, and the results were impressive.  First and foremost, the scent of this product is delightful. It has a subtle, soothing fragrance that adds to the overall relaxation of my nighttime routine. It feels like a mini spa treatment before I drift off to sleep.  One of the standout features of this serum is its firming properties. Over time, I noticed that my skin appeared visibly firmer and more toned, which was particularly noticeable around my jawline and cheek area. It seems to have a lifting effect, and I wake up with a rejuvenated complexion.  What I appreciate most about this serum is that it absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling hydrated without any greasiness. It's also gentle on my sensitive skin, causing no irritation or breakouts.  In summary, the Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum has become a favorite part of my nightly skincare routine. Its lovely scent, firming benefits, and overall effectiveness make it a product I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone looking to enhance their nighttime skincare regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received #freeproduct from Topbox Circle in exchange for my test and review.  I want to thank Caudalie and Topbox Circle for this opportunity and sending me a full size of Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum. That way, I will be able to see how it ultimately works for me and estimate all the benefits of the whole product. I've been using it for a while but it is a pretty big bottle that will still last me a long time. So now I can review my first impressions. According to application tips, I've been applying it day and night before my cream. To start with, it is lightweight, it absorbs well and feels nice. It has barely any scent which I very much prefer in cosmetics that I use. And most importantly, many cosmetic products that I I've tried on my face leave my skin oily, shiny. It is a real problem for me because I can't tell if it will until I try it, and the result can be frustrating. I instantly loved that this one doesn't add any oil / shine. For me, it's #1 selling point. My skin is rather sensitive, and I don't have any negative effects from the serum, so I will definitely continue using it. I gave it 4 stars only because I am yet to see the full results of using it, and because of the price point. If in the end I will see any improvement of my skin, it's 5 stars, and then the price is good. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. i have been using it twice daily for around three weeks and I couldn't be happier. This product is one that actually lives up to the hype it gets. This Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Serum has done more in three weeks than any other product I have used.      The serum is lightweight and absorbs almost immediately into my skin. It doesn't leave a sticky feeling and played nicely with all my other skincare. I wear a full face of makeup and had no problem with pilling. It smells amazing! It has a very clean and fresh smell and the basil makes it unusual and enjoyable. It's not a heavy scent and it does fade quickly. It's very hydrating and leaves your skin feeling soft and silky. It has a nice subtle sheen that's perfect for wearing under makeup or alone.        My skin responded to the amazing ingredients in this serum unlike any other product I have used. Since i started using this serum my have noticed a noticeable improvement in the overall firmness and elasticity of my skin.  My 11 lines look better than they ever have! It left my face feeling plump and bouncy for the first time in quite awhile. My skin texture looks so much smoother and my skin looks brighter.       The combination of resveratrol, hyaluronic acid and peptides in this serum have given me results that I can't believe. Both the packaging and ingredients in this serum are sustainable and clean so if that's a concern this product is one of the best out there. the packaging is elegant but simple. It has a very nice pump with a locking feature which I appreciate. There is no waste of product and it's very simple and easy to use.       I definitely would recommend this product to anyone looking for a serum that will make you look younger. It has earned a place in my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate enough to receive a sample of the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum from #topboxcircle, and it has truly been a delightful addition to my skincare routine. I used it both in the day and at night and found it to be effective in enhancing the elasticity and firmness of my skin.  One thing that immediately struck me was the pleasant scent and the luxurious feeling of applying the serum. It has a subtle, refreshing fragrance that adds to the overall sensory experience. The application itself is smooth and effortless, and the serum absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue.  During the day, it served as an excellent base for my makeup, creating a smooth canvas for foundation application. At night, I appreciated the fact that I could use it without worrying about potential sun exposure. This flexibility in usage is a definite plus.  As for the results, I've noticed a positive change in the texture of my skin, particularly in terms of firmness and pore refinement. The retinol alternative formula seems to work wonders without any of the usual irritation associated with retinol products.  In summary, my experience with the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum has been exceptional. It's a product that not only delivers on its promises but also provides a sensory pleasure during application. I'm grateful for the opportunity to try it out as a #freeproduct, and I'm now considering making it a permanent fixture in my skincare routine. Highly recommended for those looking to improve their skin's elasticity and overall appearance.

reviews.review_text: As always, the #freeproduct is AMAZING. I love this brand & how it feels on my skin. It really boosts my skin. It looks plumped & dewy. This product comes in a glass bottle with a pump giving it an elegant look.  No mess dropper or squeeze tube to deal with.  The Serum is light weight, smooth, and silky texture with a milky consistency.  You only need to use a little of this product.   It is quick absorbing and doesn't leave any residue behind.  This serum is vegan made with natural ingredients and has a very light fragrance.  I used this product in the morning and at night.  I noticed my skin was left feeling soft, more nourished with a restored youthful glow.  My skin was more firm reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.  This product does not interfere with your daily routine as you can comfortably apply make up over it.  My only complaint was the pump on the bottle was broke but I still used the product by unscrewing the lid.

reviews.review_text: #freeproduct As I’m approaching my 40th birthday, I notice changes in my skin. I like to use it in the morning and at night before my cream and sunscreen. This serum texture is very silky, lightweight, and it glides on my face so smoothly and absorbs easily. It has a resveratrol, a substitution of retinol, a powerful vine antioxidant which helps to visibly firm and reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles. It’s fragrance free and after using it my skin feels so moisturized, smooth, firm, and plump. After using it for a few weeks, I can see my smile lines, fine lines, and wrinkles on my forehead less visible. It’s a perfect addition to my natural beauty routine!

reviews.review_text: I've used this serum for a few weeks and am honestly liking it. I received it as a #freeproduct from TopBox for my honest feedback and my opinions are my own. Firstly, I am not a fan of the scent, it smells like old flowers lol, but the fragrance fades quickly thankfully. With that being said, the serum itself is nice. It is water based and has a liquid, runny texture. It applied very nicely and my skin drank it up. I used it at night and in the morning. It paired very well with my daytime sunscreen and my nighttime moisturizer. It has no sticky or oily feel at all which I absolutely love. I have oily skin and hate oily serums/moisturizers and was so happy this was water-based. I have had no adverse reaction like I would with Retinol serums. This being Retinol free is a huge game changers in the anti-aging category of skincare. My fine lines are improving and my skin is more supple. I will definitely continue using this.

reviews.review_text: I received Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum complimentary from Caudalie. The serum's lightweight texture and quick absorption have been a saving grace for my dry skin. It glides on smoothly and leaves no greasy residue, which is a huge plus for daytime wear. From the very beginning, I noticed a welcome boost in hydration levels. The addition of resveratrol in the formula is certainly doing its job in promoting healthier skin. The antioxidant properties have contributed to an improved overall tone and texture. As for the firming aspect, I haven't seen significant changes in that regard just yet. However, I do understand that such effects might take a bit more time. Hopefully with continued use, the cumulative benefits of the serum will eventually lead to firmer skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use an entire line of Caudalie skincare products. But this serum may be my favorite! It is a milky consistency that sinks into your skin very quickly and leaves you with a dewy glow. With continued use I have noticed my fine lines fading considerably, my skin feels firmer and has a healthy glow that I didn’t have before. I don’t particularly have sensitive skin but if I have dry patches I tend to not use much retinol because it causes my skin to peel. Caudalie uses Resveratrol which is much gentler and gave me the same results without the irritation to my already dry skin. It contains Hyaluronic Acid which is the holy grail of moisturizers. This is the first time I have used a skincare product containing Vegan Collagen but I think that is the ingredient that actually firmed my skin. I love the fact that it is in a gorgeous glass bottle with a pump that works every time. This is absolutely worth the cost. You literally only need 1-2 pumps to cover your face and neck area.

The serum has a slightly, creamy, gel-like consistency which spreads easily on the skin and sinks in instantly, leaving skin soft, hydrated, and supple looking. The serum is light and feels wonderfully so on my skin, and it leaves it glowing and noticeably smoother and much firmer.  It absorbs quickly on my skin. I have sensitive and dry skin, but no irritation or itching after using the serum. My skin immediately feels hydrated and soothed. I have seen a dramatic change in my forehead and smile lines. It’s always early 20 something’s on Tik Tok who get probably get expensive filler and facials. I’ve literally suckered myself to be on my 4th bottle because I was hoping maybe by now it would give results, but still gives nothing. No anti aging/firming/lifting results, not even a bit but maybe just hydrate my skin? It is way too expensive to just have hydrated skin and nothing else. Just save yourself the money and buy an affordable Hyaluronic acid instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This would be five stars but sadly this product made me break out. I see some other reviewers had the same experience.  I used it twice a day for a couple weeks and LOVED the scent, the texture, and how plump and glowing my skin was, but I started getting small cystic acne on my chin and jaw line (which I never have before). I honestly love this serum, so I kept using it and hoped the acne was from something else, but I stopped using it for two days and all my acne cleared up. I haven’t had a single spot since I stopped using it.  If it doesn’t make you break out, you’ll love it!

reviews.review_text: I bought this after going through a sample that lasted about a week and loved my results so I knew I wanted to buy the full size. Fortunately I was able to snag it during the sale. I had a stubborn red post-acne mark on my cheek that faded dramatically in that short period of time, and my overall skin tone is SO much more even and bright now. I am combining one pump of the Resveratrol with one pump of the Premier Cru and usually one pump of CosRX Snail Mucin.  I think the niacinamide from Premier Cru combined with the Resveratrol is golden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum as a free product in exchange for my honest review. This serum is light weight, and it absorbs by my skin easily. The texture is silky, and it glides on my face so smoothly. It’s not too oily, sticky, thick or heavy that makes my face feeling uncomfortable. The serum feels nice on the skin. It moisturizes the dry areas on my face, and it smooths out my fine lines gradually. I see a good improvement on my dull looking skin. My face feels hydrated, softer and smoother and looks brighter and healthier after using it. I like to use it day and night before sunscreen or face cream. It also helps the absorption of my other skincare products.    #freeproduct  #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_text: The Caudalie Resveratrol-lift Instant Firming Serum comes in a really nice glass bottle that i think is really cute. I apply it in the morning and at night and my skin hasn't had any breakouts. I really like the plumping effect and how hydrated this makes my skin look and feel. Overall, I absolutely love this serum! #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this serum every day for about a month. I definitely have noticed an improvement in my extremely dry skin. For reference, I had a full hysterectomy 9 years ago and am not on any kind of hormone replacement therapy , therefore, my body has not created collagen for the same amount of time. My skin has aged significantly during that time and is parched and crepey in appearance along with deeper lines developing.  Thanks to the two molecular sizes of hyaluronic acids there is an instant noticeable improvement in my skins appearance and feel. Their vegan collagen alternative has helped increase smoothness.  The texture of the serum is silky and absorbed quickly. This did not cause any piling when used with eye creams, facial oils and moisturizers. Makeup applies just fine over it and has not caused any change in how it wears throughout the day. I will repurchase and highly recommend! #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_text: I am always trying to find the best products to help me with whatever skin issues I am having, sadly I usually am not too impressed and very few brands do as they claim, until now!!! reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for almost two weeks and now I feel I can not live without it. It is and will now be a part of my permanent routine. The first thing I loved is it is vegan…. When I put it on it absorbs right in my skin and gives it moisture right away with out being greasy and it definitely lifts. I love this serum and I will continue to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is something my skin has just been drinking up. It absorbs quickly and does not feel tight. My skin feels like my own- only better. No weird sticky feeling like some serums. I noticed the tightening effect from one use. It just helped everything look fresher/younger. Awesome scent too, not too overwhelming but just a luxurious experience. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff just smells luxurious. Besides that it is super nourishing and tightening. I feel like it changed my skin over night. Caudalie’s ingredients are always next level and this is no exception!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is amazing! It really does keep my skin firm and hydrated. I like it better than most retinol and this serum doesn’t irritate my skin. The scent isn’t too strong which I like also. I can already see a difference even after a few days of use and my smile lines have lessened. I’ll continue to use for more results. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I want to state that I love this brand, Caudalie. I was gifted this product in exchange for my honest opinion. This instant firming serum is part of their resveratrol - lift collection which features a patented formula containing hyaluronic acid, resveratrol, and vegan collagen alternative, claiming to visibly firm skin. The serum has a runny, milky consistency. Its thin and absorbs into the skin after a couple minutes. Its hydrating and super gentle, no stinging or peeling. The packaging is plastic pump with glass bottle which feels high quality but is heavy. I am not the biggest fan of the scent from this line. It isn't terribly unpleasant, but when combined with the cream, it lingers for an hour after application. I have been using this serum in combination with the day cream for a month, and my skin is so smooth and more plump/ hydrated looking, but I do not notice it diminishing my fine lines. I have acne prone skin and this hasn't caused me to break out. In my opinion, this serum is worth a try if you are looking to add preventative anti aging product to your routine. If you are looking for a gentle hydrating serum that contains anti-aging ingredients, this is a solid serum. While I really enjoyed using this product, I had slightly higher expectations at this price point, so I will not be repurchasing

reviews.review_title: My new fave product of the year!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on a lifetime mission to find my holy grail beauty products and Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum is one of them.   This is an amazing serum that made my lines and wrinkles appear less prominent by simply using twice daily. I could instantly feel a tightening sensation after using which I love. I also like the gel like formula. This serum has a light, pleasant scent. I tend to have somewhat reactive skin at times, but did not experience that with this product. I can't wait to try other products in this line.

reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct in the mail for my honest review from #topbox #trywithtopbox I used this caudalie instant firming serum in the morning before putting on my makeup i love the scent of it and it's very smooth when putting it on your face and it didn't break my face out!

I facial skin has drastically improved after I started using this amazing serum since this serum lifts and firms and is 2 times more effective than retinol.  I use this serum both morning and evening.  I have already recommended the Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum to many of my friends and family and several of them have already purchased and used this serum and they all their improved skins these days.

I like the smell and it seems to nicely moisturize my skin but I see no other benefit to it.

reviews.review_title: It's okay, definitely not worth the money
reviews.review_text: So far so good. I do not see any changes in my skin yet, but I have only been using it for about 2 weeks. My only complaint is that I feel like my skin is tight and dry after this serum absorbed into it. Maybe that is why they call it instant firming because it makes your skin tight. Haha.... Joking aside, it feels drying to me. I follow it up with a heavy moisturizer, and I am fine afterwards. I'll update my review if I see any changes to my skin. I already know that I won't buy it again because the price tag is ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is effective, but also irritating to my skin. I'm well versed in standard Retinol creams, serums and peels and I'm very lucky they don't cause me irritation. However with all the warnings on Retinol during childbearing years I thought Reservatrol was worth a try. This produces similar results to Retinol products like brighter/more even skin tone, tighter skin, reduced appearance of lines and overall I like the effect. However when using it my face felt uncomfortably tight. I experienced itching on my cheeks and forehead that was mild but persistent. I feel at this price point that there are better options, but I will give it 3 stars because it does work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this stuff. I went out the other day without any makeup, after using the Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Retinol Alternative Serum and then the Caudalie Vinosource-Hydra SOS Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum on top, and I got 2 compliments on my 57 year old skin. The product smooths fine lines and firms and smooths facial contours. I started noticing the improvement after only a few days of use. I typically do not use serums under make up because of pilling, but this one pairs well with foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this item as I love caudalie products the fragrance In it is a natural fragrance not artificial its 2x effective as a Retinol however it's clean and free of parabens, alcohol, and more in 5 weeks I finished my bottle and I noticed a huge difference my skin is firmer and my 11 lines are barely there anymore I recommend this product 100%  I attached a before and after picture using this.

reviews.review_title: Sensitive skin approved for daily use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin and traditional retinol products usually make my skin red and flaky.  I end up only being able to use them a few nights per week because of the negative side effects.  I love that this serum not only uses resveratrol, a more gentle anti-aging ingredient, but also contains hydrating components like hyaluronic acid and peptides to counteract any potential irritation and dryness.  I am able to use this serum twice daily with no issues which means I am able to actually see results more quickly.  It has an herbal scent and the consistency of a lotion.  The pump makes application extremely easy.  This serum absorbs instantly into the skin and doesn't leave behind a sticky residue.  After a month of use, my face is clearer and brighter, and a few rough patches have been entirely smoothed out. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so lucky to get to try Caudalie's new Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Serum as a #freeproduct from #Caudalie and #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest opinion. I've been using this serum along with Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Firming Cashmere Cream for about a month now,and I will say that it started out slow. No noticeable changes at first. But after around week 3 I finally noticed that my fine lines are slowly getting thinner and slightly less noticeable. My skin has never felt so soft and smooth,and finally feels like it's getting the moisture it needs. I have had no dry skin whatsoever in the past two weeks,usually I spend the entire summer with dry patches on my face. I love the ingredients as well! This is vegan with 97% natural ingredients,and it contains Caudalie's own patented retinol alternative,which has been proven to be 2x more effective as retinol when it comes to Firming your skin. I would definitely recommend trying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming  Serum for two weeks i can see difference on my skin. The wrinkles are  smoother and my skin is brighter. I love the lightweight texture and the none sticky feeling on my skin.  I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Serum as a #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest review. First let me say, I'm already a huge fan of Caudalie and have thoroughly enjoyed each product I have tried from their skincare lines so far. This luxurious and effective firming serum was no exception and has a light pleasant scent and feels silky when it glides onto the skin. Designed to firm and lift the skin while reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, this vegan serum is formulated with Caudalie's exclusively patented Retinol alternative. I've been using in addition to the Cashmere Firming Cream and have really loved the way these both make my skin look and feel. The serum has a lightweight, milky consistency and sinks into the skin very beautifully, it doesn't feel heavy or leave any sticky residue on the skin. I am in my mid-forties and am always looking for anti-aging products to help keep my skin looking its best and I've definitely seen some visible improvements when using this combo in my nighttime skin routine. If you're looking for something luxurious, clean and packed with effective ingredients including Resveratrol, hyaluronic acid, vegan collagen alternatives and firming peptides this would be a lovely addition to your skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: This made my skin really smooth!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox. The Caudalie Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum comes in really cute pink bottles, which I loved. The serum has a milky consistency with a light herbal scent that I don't even notice after a few minutes. This vegan collagen alternative serum was really gentle on my skin. I used this product once in the morning and once at night for the last few weeks and my skin never broke out or had any adverse reactions. I liked the plumping effect and I feel that my pores appear a bit smaller. The serum was really hydrating and left my skin feeling soft and smooth. My only complaint is that I didn't see more noticeable results with my fine lines and wrinkles. I still have plenty of product left to continue to see results, but for the moment, I would give this serum 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has a milky texture and a light floral scent. It's absorbed on contact, and my skin looks and feels hydrated. After about a months use my face and neck look firmer and feel incredibly hydrated. A small amount will go a long way, with results that you will notice. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_text: This serum is very moisturizing and absorbs quickly. I love how lightweight it feels on my skin. It is such an amazing product. I have been dealing with acne for so many years and I have dark spots and discoloration on my face. I started with using it every other day and gradually increased to using it once daily just to see how my skin would react. My skin discoloration and spots are fading gradually and I’ll definitely continue using this. A little goes a long way. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Caudalie resveratrol lift instant firming serum #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest opinion. I have used this for a couple weeks now once a day in combination with the instant firming cashmere moisturizer and I love almost everything about this regiment. The one con I have listed is that I did experience pilling after applying the moisturizer over the serum. I admittedly do probably use an excessive amount of product, but it was worth noting. Aside from that, I love the light scent of this milky serum that my skin drinks right up, and I love that even the directions for use include the decollete which has been an area of major concern for me lately. This regiment has altogether left me with firmer, brighter, plumper, and all around healthier looking and feeling skin.

reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of Caudalie, as I know their skincare is vegan, clean and free from ingredients that are potentially harmful to our body and environment. Their container and packaging also focus on sustainable sourcing.  I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox, I love the light lemongrass scent from the cream, the smell is divine and I feel very relaxed by massaging my face with it. It contains patented resveratrol, hyaluronic acids, shea better along with vegan collage.This serum is lightweight, very easy to apply and I'm happy that my sensitive skin approved it. This serum aims to reduce fine lines and wrinkles on your face, I don't see the instant firming effect on me as I'm not at that age yet. As a hydrating serum it is really good, it absorbs immediately into my skin, softening and filling the skin with a delightful glow, I feel my skin become plumper and radiant.  I enjoy using this antioxidant firming serum, the quality is great compared to other serums in the market. I will highly recommend it to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this twice a day. Works well under makeup and with other skincare. The eye serum is one of the only things I have noticed improvement with over time. I purchase directly from Caudalie because their rewards program is phenomenal. I get a free bottle with every fourth purchase. Since I use a lot of Caudalie products, I haven’t paid for this in years.

I received this #freeproduct from #TryItWithTopBox in exchange for my honest review.    Resveratrol-Lift Instant Firming Serum has a lightweight, milky texture that absorbs easily into the skin with any residue.  There is a faint herbal scent that disappears quickly and does not linger for any migraine triggers.  My skin felt instantly supple and hydrated.  This serum is both nourishing and great at smoothing skin texture.   I love that this formula is a powerful combination of Resveratrol, Hyaluronic Acid, Olive Squalane, Peptides, and Vegan Collagen.  It’s like using Retinol without any associated side effects such as skin redness, peeling, or irritation.

reviews.review_title: great for those who can’t tolerate vitamin c
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for about a month now and am a fan, but not for the reason I bought it. I originally purchased the set, and enjoyed the mini moisturizer + eye cream! The serum hasn’t diminished my vertical forehead lines a ton, but does plump them and the rest of my skin up. It absorbs very well into the skin and brings luminosity to it as well, which is great since I can’t tolerate vitamin c at all.  The most surprising benefit I’ve noticed has been the improvement of my dark acne marks! They have lightened up almost entirely since adding this to my routine. I also have not experienced breakouts from this product.  The formulation is excellent, the benefits have been great, but the price tag is steep for a product that doesn’t improve fine lines as well as advertised.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum for a little over a month in conjunction with Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Firming Cashmere Moisturizer and I have seen improvements in my overall appearance of my face and neck. reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest review. This serum has a light scent that dissipates upon application. My skin is remaining hydrated throughout the day and night, it is softer, smoother and brighter and overall it looks healthier. I have recently started to notice a little bit of plumping in my forehead wrinkles. Caudalie's resveratrol, a retinol alternative, is non-irritating and the hyaluronic acid promotes hydration. These two ingredients and others are helping my skin look and feel its best! Another 5 star product from Caudalie!

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite products from Caudalie. I was intrigued by the anti-aging benefits from the start, but I was sold on this being oil-free. The reservatol lift serum is gentle, non-irritating, and best of all, effective. The ingredients are as stellar as the Caudalie reputation: antioxidant reservatol, 2 forms of hyaluronic acid, and a vegan collagen alternative. This firming serum has given better results than retinol for me, and without any irritation whatsoever. After using it consistently for three weeks, fine lines are negligible and my skin is softer.  I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review, and I’m so thrilled with it that I will be a regular user. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_text: #trywithtopbox gifted me Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Serum for my #freeproduct and, used with the cashmere moisturizer, my skin looks and feels AMAZING! The peptide composition works with your natural collagen and elastin to lift facial contours and reduce the visual appearance of aging. The serum is formulated without parabens, without sulfates and without phthalates!  I use anti-aging products to prevent signs of aging, rather than treat them.  That being said, after a couple weeks of regular use the laugh lines around my mouth and the forehead lines were smoother. My cheeks are plumper, my complexion is glowing, and my skin feels softer than ever.  ** Key Ingredients:  Hyaluronic acid Resveratrol  What is Resveratrol??  *Fights aging, reduces pigmentation, reduces the appearance of fine lines, brightens the complexion, and firms skin.   What is hyaluronic acid? * Research suggest that hyaluronic acid works with your body's natural collagen and elastin to keep your skin moisturized which prevents tightness, boost elasticity and help reduce scarring.  #gifted #thankyou #skincare #hyalauronic acid #resveratrol #antiaging #fragranceskincare #housewife #mommycreator #caudalie #serum #collagenalternative

reviews.review_text: Ugh . I wanted to love this so bad . And I kept giving it another chance only to end up feeling pretty bummed still . While the packaging is nice, pretty pale pink frosted glass bottles, and the scent is lovely (personally prefer the serum scent over the cream scent) as well as a lovely feeling product texture before and after applying, it just did not do much for me. Like at all. Yeah my skin looks shinier (not necessarily a good thing depending on how shiny either technically but I am wondering if that is just me applying too much at once or something) and I guess my skin is brighter but as far as fine lines, dark circles (if that was included in what it was supposed to help with) and helping imperfections (uneven skin tones, dark spots, dark circles, etc etc) I feel like this is just making those imprefections hydrated feeling, BRIGHTER & more noticable than they were without putting product on. Skin less dull looking (a little) but rest of the imperfections are looking like center stage. I don't know. this product just didn't do it for me and maybe that has some to do with the fact I started out using the premier Cru line which is significantly more expensive than this one, but I actually felt more satisfied with the results immediately even & felt that line lived up better to what the products claims of doing. I'll maybe keep trying it here and there, MAYBE, just until I feel like I'm not wasting way too much of it if I stop using but I do not foresee recommending it or definitely not purchasing. #freeproduct #tryitwithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I enjoy this new product and I will continue using it, in combination with it's product pairing. I received this #freeproduct in exchange for my review. I am 35 years old, and I have normal skin. On the first day of trying the cream, I used the combination of the firming cashmere cream and the instant firming serum. After washing my face in the shower, I applied these products. My sensitive skin didn't turn bright red, the scent was pretty nice, and it felt luxurious on my skin. I was taken by surprise when I could feel my skin slowly tightening up just minutes after the first application of the combination. This combination gives me super smooth skin, and I can already see my pores appear smaller. Additionally, these two products leave a nice shine. To note, I added my foundation primer and foundation on top, and this canceled the shine. The downside was that my foundation was sitting in my pores rather than blending amongst them. I will use these creams on no makeup days. In summary, my face looks younger in that it appears taught.  On day two, I used just the firming cashmere cream. The scent is fine, and my face is extremely soft to the touch. The singular product doesn't get my face as tight as the combination of products, or as shiny. On day three, I used just the instant firming serum. I again feel that pairing the two products results in when you feel the most tightening on your face. Alone, this product provides a light shine and a light fragrance. On day four and beyond, I used the combination of the two products without foundation, and I'm happy with them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion and I am going to give it to you #freeproduct #trywithtopbox. Ordinary, retinol products can cause some irritations or sensitivity to my skin and I haven't been to impressed in the past with the results anyway. Therefore, it hadn't been a product that I necessarily seemed out. However,  this one is VERY different. As I have aged, my skin tone has become uneven and my pores have become larger in appearance.  My eyes have fine lines and wrinkles, and skin discoloration has become a big point of contention as well. It took about three uses before I noticed the fine lines that were deeper set around my crows feet had almost disappeared. After a week, the age spots had diminished so much that they were almost gone. I didn't even have to cover them with make-up anymore. My skin tone improved after the first use. It was immediately more supple and hydrated. After about two weeks of use, my pores have almost diminished. I don't wear foundation anymore all because of this product. My only real critique would be that a spray foam or touch less application process would be preferable to minimize any bacterial transfer from hand to face at application but I will and have recommended this to ALL of my friends and family. This is an excellent product and I do not say that often. It is a bit pricier than other alternatives but you get what you pay for.  If you want young looking and feeling skin, then this will do it.

Their study shows 84% having firmer skin after 56 days, so I’m considering purchasing a bottle to test it further since I don’t firmer skin at this point. The reason for four stars is that I feel one bottle isn't quite enough to determine if it lives up to the claims. Overall this is a lovely product that I recommend. I used this Resveratrole Lift Instant Firming Serum in the mornings and at nights after cleansing and the scent is pleasant. The serum is light and feels wonderfully so on my skin, and it leaves it glowing and noticeably smoother and much firmer. The lines on my forehead and wrinkles around my cheeks and nose are completely smooth and the skin on my cheeks are plumper and so firm. This #freeproduct is awesome stuff, and is worth splurging on for a lifetime!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the instant firming serum twice a day consistently. I adore this stuff. From the smell to the results, this serum has met all of my skin needs. I love the subtle hint of lemon, it seriously energizes me in the mornings! My skin has evened out dramatically and also lifted quite a bit. I noticed my fine lines and under eye wrinkles began disappearing almost immediately! Can’t wait to recommend to friends and family. #FreeProduct

reviews.review_text: I really loved the beautiful scent of this serum. It’s on the thicker side than those I have had previously. It’s very smooth and absorbed quite nicely on the skin. My skin feels tighter, smoother with a very lovely scent that lasted for a while. I love the firmness, glowing feeling of my skin in the morning. This is a complimentary product #trywithtopbox #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum receives high marks for me for how quickly I started noticing a difference in my skin. I typically have combination skin but during the cold, dry winter months my skin tends to err more on the side of dry. This serum was extremely easy to dispense and distribute over the skin on my face and neck. After just a few applications, my skin felt softer, more supple and a bit more full of life. #freeproduct
